title: Villain's Code of Conduct
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NDlsco

by viviegirl05

Loki, Doom, Magneto, Mystique, and Killmonger visit Tony after Siberia to give their condolences for the civil war and declare the Rogues bad for their villainous reputations. When the Rogues show up and try to attack, the villains show them they won’t stand for that kind of behavior from so-called heroes. They decided to drag them down legally, and throw in Ross for the sake of being thorough.

blog.name: misadventuresofsupremefam
blog.title: It’s Not Sarcasm. It’s Class
blog.description:
Here lies all the misadventures of

THE SUPREME FAMILY OF MIDGARD

summary:
Stephen: Hey, Tony?
Tony: *tinkering a part of a suit* Yes, dear?
Stephen: Aren’t you tired with people calling you Stark all...
body:
Stephen: Hey, Tony?

Tony: *tinkering a part of a suit* Yes, dear?

Stephen: Aren’t you tired with people calling you Stark all the time?

Tony: *smiles* Well, why would I be if that’s my— *turns around and sees Stephen on one knee with a ring*

Stephen: I just think it’s time for a change. Give the people a little bit of a mouthful.

Tony: You stupid wizard! Of course I wanna be Stark-Strange!

body:
Masterlist - Sweetener Series

Song: fake smile - Ariana Grande

Prompt: “fuck a fake smile”

Summary: you aren’t having any shit with your friends

Warnings: angst let’s be honest the whole thing is gonna be pretty angsty

it was five months and 22 days after Peter and you broke up and got matching tattoos. You’ve learned so much from your past experiences and coming out the other side a better person. But you’re certainly not out of the woods yet. Everyone thought you and Peter were better together, maybe they were right but you certainly weren’t ready to see if they were right.

School was such a pain, you started putting on fake smiles after you broke up and it became a habit. Everytime you try to stop and show your real feelings someone pisses you off and you just flash a fake smile to let them know your fine. Your always fine. Until one day they go to far.

“(Y/N) how’s Peter?” Gwen asked taking a bite of her sandwich loudly.

“Good why?” You eyed her suspiciously.

“Just you both looked so happy when you two were an item,” she continued to chew.

“Oh like were not happy now?” You spat back offended.

“That’s not what i meant (Y/N),” Gwen put her sandwich down.

“Well if your planning on trying to get us back together, dont. Just don’t. If it was meant to be it’ll happen naturally,” i get up and leave the cafeteria.

“Gwen,” MJ sighed, “You are so stupid.”

“Why? What did i do?” Gwen sincerely asked.

What your friends didn’t understand was that you were still friends with Peter. But it was just that, friends. MJ understood but that’s cause MJ isn’t trying to get you guys back together. She knows what a mess you were after the break up. And knows if you want to get back together it’s time that healed your wounds enough to make it possible.

“Parker!” You slightly smiled when you saw him in the halls.

He turned to see you coming and simply said, “Hey.”

“I’m not feeling well can you get my homework for me?” You asked looking into his eyes.

“Yeah sure,” Peter hugged you goodbye and watched you leave through the school doors.

Walking away from school you had had enough. Finally decided to not take any shit from anyone anymore no matter who they were. No more fake smiles. No smiles from now one unless you truly wanted to smile.

At home you grab the ice cream out of the freezer and sit at the table with a spoon thinking about everything that has happened. Until a knock on the door jolted you up out of your seat. Answering the door you saw Peter.

“You almost scared the ice cream into my lap!” you let him in and lead him to where you had been sitting. Continuing to eat your ice cream you asked, “Why are you here? School isn’t out yet?”

“Something didn’t feel right in the hall earlier. Are you alright?” He put a hand on your knee for comfort.

“My friends wont let our relationship drop and it’s pissing me off,” you raised your voice.

“Why are you letting them get to you? That not the (Y/N) I know,” Peter softened.

“I don’t know? I used to let it slide but now it’s getting old I want them to drop it,” You sighed.

“Why don’t you tell them that? Put on your best smile and tell them how you really feel,” Peter tried to help.

“No. Fuck a fake smile,” You glared into space.

“I didn’t say anything about a fake smile,” he was taken back by how serious you were.

“Well that’s what i’d be putting on if i confronted them right now,” You leaned forward for more ice cream. But Peter took it from your grasp.

“No more ice cream for you,” Peter got up and put the ice cream back in the freezer, “You want a sandwich? We could go get one.”

“Yeah i’m down,” You grabbed your wallet ready to go but Peter stopped you and shook his head.

“It’s on me,”You were opposed to the idea of him paying for your food except you knew he would anyway.

Walking together to the deli you bonded over the fact you were both over it. You just wanted all your friends no the whole school to just accept the fact that you broke up. It’s normal for people to break up even if they still had strong feelings for each other. Neither of them were ready to be in a relationship.

——————————————————————————————

a/n: oh my god it has been such a journey to get here. i love that you get to read this now i love that i had this planned like so far in advance so i wasn’t scrambling around like the first time. i hope you enjoy this its going to make you faint<3

Tag List: @doubleuwu @choke-me-sweet-pea @living-dead-parker @loki-in-hogwarts @rainbow-marvel

  • Tony has never known guilt in the way he feels when he looks at Peter Parker, his young protege, his seventeen-year old mentee…
  • Because Tony has feelings for him, and not in the platonic sense.  Romantic feelings, sexual feelings.
  • What Tony would do to rip the boy’s clothes off and pin him to the bed…
  • But Peter’s sweet.  He’s pure, innocent, good.  He’s probably never done a single bad thing in his life.  He helps old ladies cross the street, for God’s sake… he’s an angel.  A literal angel.
  • Which is why Tony feels so damn guilty.
  • Most of the time he can keep his feelings at bay, but there are times when he catches himself slipping up - staring for too long, lingering touches, licking his lips, not-so-subtly checking him out.
  • And how can he help himself?  Peter may be an innocent little angel, but it doesn’t mean he’s not incredibly sexy.
  • He probably doesn’t even know what sex is, Tony reminds himself.
  • He’s a teenage boy, of COURSE he knows what sex is, the rational part of Tony’s brain says.
  • But even if Tony thinks rationally, he just can’t believe that his innocent Peter would ever think of sex.
  • So one day, Tony decides to surprise Peter by heading over to his place and inviting him over to the lab to work on some stuff.
  • Really, Tony could have put in a text, but he wants to see Peter.
  • Is that so wrong?
  • yes, Tony.  Yes it is.
  • He makes pleasant small-talk with May Parker before heading to Peter’s bedroom.  He’s about to knock, but as his knuckle makes contact with the wooden door, the door swings open silently.
  • Tony walks inside, and he freezes on the spot.
  • Peter - his sweet  innocent Peter - is lying on his bed and wanking.
  • Tony knows it’s wrong beyond measure but he can’t tear his eyes away.
  • Peter looks so fucking hot, and Tony has to really work hard to not stride up to him and have him.
  • So he stares.
  • Peter’s head is back against his pillow, eyes closed, lips slightly parted.  He’s stroking himself slowly, making the sweetest noises Tony’s ever heard.
  • Tony can feel himself getting hard, and he knows he has to leave before he ruins everything.  Peter can’t catch him staring.  Peter can’t catch him getting off to him.  It’s wrong.  Tony knows it.
  • He turns to leave the room, and just as he’s about to open the door, he hears in the softest, sexiest voice,
  • “Mr Stark.”
  • Fuck, Tony thinks.  I’ve been caught.
  • But when he turns shamefully back to Peter, Peter’s eyes are still shut but now he’s jerking himself off much faster and moaning louder.
  • Maybe Tony had imagined it?  But then…
  • “Mr Stark, fuck me,” Peter moans, and it’s then that Tony sees that Peter isn’t just masturbating, but he has a butt plug in his ass.
  • Tony nearly cums there and then.
  • “Please, Mr Stark,” Peter says, breath becoming erratic.
  • And Tony still can’t believe Peter is doing this.  And more so, saying his name.  He isn’t quite sure how to react.  He’s now achingly hard.
  • He finds himself somehow moving closer to Peter.  It’s like his cock has precedence over his brain, and he has no control.
  • He can’t help moving his hand to rub his cock through his pants, staring down at Peter lustfully.
  • Much to his horror, he loses it.  He moans - out loud.  
  • His eyes snap open in fear and he automatically looks towards Peter’s face.
  • Peter’s eyes are now open too, and his face is redder than ever.
  • “Mr Stark! I- what-” Peter flails adorably, pulling his duvet over himself and blinking rapidly.  “-You didn’t knock, I- crap, crap, crap, shit-”
  • Tony knows he’s busted for watching, so he decides to play it cool. “Look at you, Mr Parker.”
  • Peter only blushes more.
  • “Here I was thinking you were an innocent little boy, but look at you - cursing, wanking off to thoughts of me,” he smirks at the last part.
  • “N-Not to you… Mr Stark, I would never.”
  • Tony raises his eyebrows and Peter’s flushed face is the most beautiful thing he’s ever seen.
  • “I- yes.  Maybe I was… you’re… well… you’re Tony Stark.  How could I not?”
  • “Well spotted,” Tony smiles.  He sits down on the edge of Peter’s bed, and he loves how Peter seems to become instantly more nervous.
  • “I’m sorry,” Peter says quietly, obviously mortified.
  • Tony decides now is the time to give into his dark desires.  Heck, the boy obviously wants him.  Why should he feel guilty about wanting Peter back?
  • “No worries, Pete,” Tony says slowly, eyeing him hungrily.  “Maybe I do the same thing to thoughts of you.”
  • “I- WHAT?!” Peter stammers.
  • “Well, you’re Peter Parker.  Come on,” Tony smirks, repeating Peter’s earlier excuse.  “How could I not?”
  • Peter doesn’t seem to know what to say, he’s just gaping at Tony with the cutest blush tinting his cheeks.
  • “Anyway, I came here to ask if you’d like to come to the lab and work on stuff with me?”
  • “Uh- sure.”
  • “You can work on me if you want,” Tony winks and gets up.  “I’ll be waiting in my lab.”
  • Tony walks towards the door with a cocky smile, and stops when he hears Peter speak, so in shock that he almost lets it show,
  • “With no clothes on, I hope,” Peter says in the smallest voice, and Tony can almost hear the cheeky smile that accompanies his bold words.
  • Fuck, Tony thinks, staring ahead.  Not so innocent after all.
  • “You got it, kid,” Tony says, smiling to himself and walking out of the bedroom.

summary: Cutscene: JARVIS & Tony Convo on Dr. Strange/Infinity Stones
title: Cutscene: JARVIS & Tony Convo on Dr. Strange/Infinity Stones
body:
…This short bit was cut from a flashback into the initial infodump way back in Chapter 2 of Veni, Vidi, Amavi. Too short to be really considered complete or meaningful on its own, but perhaps interesting in terms of dangling Infinity Wars plot-threads lurking in the background of Ex Libris Infinitum. Probably mostly canon, or at least canon-adjacent, but as with anything I post on tumblr I reserve the right to change that in-verse.

+++

Still, I don’t know where else we could start.

“Dr. Strange is a neurosurgeon, and who knows when he decided to make the career shift to Gandalf impersonator, let alone who had the timestone before him. Tracking down Hogwarts or the Chamber of Secrets, is that already on the list?

“Not important. Tesseract’s in the ocean with Cap. Mind Stone is… wherever it was before Loki brought it to Earth in his stick of destiny…” He trailed off, much to then-JARVIS’s confusion.

“Son of a bitch.”

“Sir?”

“Nothing. Just… don’t you think it’s odd? These super-powerful stones are hidden away for thousands of years, some of them literally in other dimensions. Then Thanos got his hands on one of them, and suddenly they’re popping out of the woodwork one after another like Easter eggs? No way that’s a coincidence.”

“It does seem unlikely,” JARVIS agreed, a somewhat leading lilt to the statement.

“Stop me if it’s such my ego talking here, but… the military and my father get their hands on the Tesseract in the forties, which is secretly also the space stone. Seventy years later, Thanos has somehow gotten his hands on the mind stone. Maybe he already had it before, but I’m thinking not, or he would have used it sooner. And we already know you can track one of these guys by energy signature. And for that to work you have to already have captured a baseline set of readings in the first place. We only ever got proper readings from the Tesseract, but the little data we got from the Scepter before–the preliminary readings suggested some sort of resonance.”
